posts.post_content:
Sold.

Very poor condition HoF Flick. Scrapped back and tape on the front. That said, the image is still visible and it will probably be some time before you see a cheaper HoF T206 on the board. 

$19 shipped in a plain white envelope. PayPal F/F. Add $3 for USPS tracking. Please PM me if you want it.
